EN.aboutMe:
I'm Riccardo and I'm currently a computer science student at the faculty of studies in Turin, the city where I come from.
I decided to pursue my career in this area because I strongly believe in the impact that virtual means are having in the daily life of all of us. I often like to compare the figure of the programmer to that of a small inventor, able to create something functional and have full control over it.
On this platform I will publish projects that I work on during my free time and for university.

My skill:
EN.profile: To find out more about my professional life:
EN.flashApp:
FlashApp is a learning aid application.
The app allows you to create decks of cards (flashcards): each card has a space for the question and one for the answer. It will be the user who creates the cards, in fact in order to play it is necessary to have created at least one card.
The game consists in reading the question, turning the card and indicating whether or not you guessed right, using the appropriate buttons.
App available only for Android, below is the link to the Google Play Store.

FR.flashApp:
FlashApp est une application d'aide à l'apprentissage.
L'application permet de créer des jeux de cartes (flashcards) : chaque carte a un espace pour la question et un pour la réponse. Ce sera l'utilisateur qui créera les cartes, en effet pour jouer il faut avoir créé au moins une carte.
Le jeu consiste à lire la question, à tourner la carte et à indiquer si vous avez bien deviné ou non, à l'aide des boutons appropriés.
Application disponible uniquement pour Android, ci-dessous le lien vers le Google Play Store.

IT.flashApp:
FlashApp è un applicazione per l'aiuto all'apprendimento.
L'app permette di creare dei mazzi di carte (flashcard): ogni carta ha uno spazio per la domanda e uno per la risposta. Sarà l'utente a creare le carte, infatti per poter giocare è necessario aver creato almeno una carta.
Il gioco consiste nel leggere la domanda, ruotare la carta e indicare se si ha indovinato, o meno, usando gli appositi bottoni.
App disponibile solo per Android, di seguito il link al Google Play Store.
